channel.title: ItemChat?
channel.description: Okay so after getting more insight I'm after the packetsender method for ItemChat? (Dialogue that shows one or more items as seen in tutorial island) does anyone know what it is? Doesn't matter what source it's from as long as it's 317 as I'll convert it. Thanks <3
